intro: Randia stolzii, commonly known as the redroot stolzii, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa, particularly South Africa. The plant is characterized by its slender, branching stems and small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pink. Its leaves are typically opposite, ovate, and have a smooth or slightly hairy surface. Randia stolzii is often found in open, disturbed habitats and can thrive in a variety of soil types.
